DOC.brief_summary: We previously publish comparative split-face study show significant , albeit moderate , effect ablative fractional laser treatment . While indicate single session fractional ablative laser effective treatment peri-orbital wrinkle , trial also reveal substantial disagreement different end point ( profilometry , Fitzpatrick wrinkle score , patient satisfaction ) . Since PBI patient-related index could include aforementioned split-face trial ; present study therefore attempts elucidate patient-related benefit single fractional ablative laser treatment session well carefully analyse respective correlation outcome parameter employ .
